ClassInfo.author: JEAF Development Team
ClassInfo.description: Class contains all generated constants for JEAF Security.

Message.defaultText: Unable to communicate with Active Directory Server under URL ''{0}''. Please make sure the the URL is correct and that the server is accessible.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if the connect to an active directory fails.
Message.name: COMMUNICATION_ERROR_TO_AD

LocalizedMessage.localizedText: Es konnte keine Verbindung zum Active Directory Server mit der URL ''{0}'' hergestellt werden. Bitte stellen Sie sicher, dass die URL korrekt ist und auf den Server zugegriffen werden kann.

Message.defaultText: Lookup for user ''{0}'' in Active Directory failed.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if the connect to an active directory fails.
Message.name: USER_LOOKUP_FAILED

LocalizedMessage.localizedText: Zugriff auf Benutzerdetails des Benutzers ''{0}'' fehlgeschlagen.

Message.defaultText: Lookup for user ''{0}'' in Active Directory failed. May be the defined search base ''{1}'' does not fit.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a user could not be found in Active Directory.
Message.name: USER_NOT_FOUND

LocalizedMessage.localizedText: Zugriff auf Benutzerdetails des Benutzers ''{0}'' fehlgeschlagen. Eventuell stimmt der Suchpfad ''{1}'' nicht.

Message.defaultText: Query for user accounts in Active Directory failed.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if the connect to an active directory fails.
Message.name: USER_QUERY_FAILED

LocalizedMessage.localizedText: Fehler bei der Suche im Active Directory.

Message.defaultText: Exception when trying to close connection to Active Directory Server ''{0}''.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if an exception occurs when trying to close connection to active directory server.
Message.name: ERROR_ON_CLOSE_CONNECTION

LocalizedMessage.localizedText: Fehler bei m Schliessen der Verbindung zum Active Directory Server ''{0}''.

Message.defaultText: Executing query ''{0}'' on Active Directory Server ''{1}'' (onlyActiveIdentities = {2}).
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if an exception occurs when trying to close connection to active directory server.
Message.name: EXECUTING_AD_QUERY

Message.defaultText: Creating users in active directory is currently not supported.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a new user should be created in active directory server during registration.
Message.name: CREATING_AD_USERS_NOT_SUPPORTED

Message.defaultText: Registration of user ''{0}'' failed. Please ensure that the combination of login name and password is correct and that your account is not disabled in the connected Active Directory (URL: {1}).
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a new user should be created in active directory server during registration.
Message.name: LOGIN_TO_AD_FAILED

LocalizedMessage.localizedText: Registrierung des Benutzers ''{0}'' ist fehlgeschlagen. Bitte stellen Sie sicher, dass die Kombination von Benutzername und Password korrekt ist und dass der Account im angebundenen Active Directory (URL: {1}) nicht gesperrt ist.

Message.defaultText: Change of Active Directory password is currently not supported. Please change your Active Directory password through your Windows computer or contact your administrator.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a new user tries to change his active directory password.
Message.name: AD_PASSWORD_CHANGE_NOT_SUPPORTED

LocalizedMessage.localizedText: Das Ändern eines Active Directory Passworts wird aktuell nicht unterstützt. Bitte ändern Sie Ihr Active Directory Passwort über Windows oder kontaktieren Sie Ihren Administrator.

Message.defaultText: Unable to connect to Active Directory with user ''{0}''. Please ensure that the user exists and the password and all other entries are correct.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a connect to an Active Directory fails.
Message.name: AD_AUTHENTICATION_ERROR

LocalizedMessage.localizedText: Zugriff auf Active Directory mit dem Benutzer ''{0}'' fehlgeschlagen. Bitte stellen Sie sicher, dass der Benutzer existiert und das Passwort und alle anderen Eingaben korrekt sind.

Message.defaultText: Active Directory query returned unprocessed continuation references. Please check your configuration.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a query in active directory contains unprocessed references.
Message.name: UNPROCESSED_REFERENCES

Message.defaultText: Unable to establish connection to user account database.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a lookup for users fails..
Message.name: DB_CONNECTION_ERROR

LocalizedMessage.localizedText: Verbindung zur Benutzer-Datenbank konnte nicht hergestellt werden.

Message.defaultText: Lookup for user ''{0}'' failed. The user could not be found.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a lookup for users fails..
Message.name: USER_NOT_FOUND_IN_JEAF_IDP

LocalizedMessage.localizedText: Suche nach Benutzer ''{0}''fehlgeschlagen. Der Benutzer konnte nicht gefunden werden.

Message.defaultText: Creating users is currently not supported.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a new user should be created in JEAF IDP during registration.
Message.name: CREATING_JEAF_IDP_USERS_NOT_SUPPORTED

Message.defaultText: Creating users in external identity provider is currently not supported.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a new user should be created in a SAML based identitiy provider during registration.
Message.name: CREATING_SAML_USERS_NOT_SUPPORTED

Message.defaultText: Change of password in external identity provider is currently not supported. Please change your password through the mechanism of the external identity provider or contact your system administrator.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a new user tries to change his SAML password.
Message.name: SAML_PASSWORD_CHANGE_NOT_SUPPORTED

LocalizedMessage.localizedText: Das Ändern von Passwörtern in einem externen Login Provider wird aktuell nicht unterstützt. Bitte ändern Sie Ihr Passwort über den Login Provider oder kontaktieren Sie Ihren Administrator.

Message.defaultText: Quering users in external identity provider is currently not supported.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a new user should be created in a SAML based identitiy provider during registration.
Message.name: SAML_USERS_QUERY_NOT_SUPPORTED

Message.defaultText: The passed SAML token is invalid (Name-ID: {0}). See log file for further details.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a invalid saml token is passed on a login.
Message.name: SAML_TOKEN_INVALID

Message.defaultText: The passed SAML token is invalid. The required SAML attribute ''{0}'' is missing. This is probably in the SAML configuration issues of your Identity Management Systems. Please check WEEASY documentation for further details about SAML configuration.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a invalid saml token is passed on a login.
Message.name: SAML_LOGIN_NAME_MISSING

Message.defaultText: SECURITY ISSUE: Validity of SAML tokens is not checked. This is a fatal security issue. Please check the configuration of your system and contact our support team.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a invalid saml token is passed on a login.
Message.name: SAML_VALIDITY_CHECK_DISABLED

Message.defaultText: The passed SAML token does not match to the passed login name. (Login name: ''{0}} SAML-Token User: ''{1}'')
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if user name and SAML token do not match.
Message.name: SAML_LOGIN_TOKEN_MISMATCH

Message.defaultText: Creating users in external identity provider is currently not supported.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a new user should be created in a SAML based identitiy provider during registration.
Message.name: CREATING_OAUTH_USERS_NOT_SUPPORTED

Message.defaultText: Change of password in external identity provider is currently not supported. Please change your password through the mechanism of the external identity provider or contact your system administrator.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a new user tries to change his SAML password.
Message.name: OAUTH_PASSWORD_CHANGE_NOT_SUPPORTED

LocalizedMessage.localizedText: Das Ändern von Passwörtern in einem externen Login Provider wird aktuell nicht unterstützt. Bitte ändern Sie Ihr Passwort über den Login Provider oder kontaktieren Sie Ihren Administrator.

Message.defaultText: Quering users in external identity provider is currently not supported.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a new user should be created in a SAML based identitiy provider during registration.
Message.name: OAUTH_USERS_QUERY_NOT_SUPPORTED

Message.defaultText: Request to OAuth provider with URL ''{0}'' failed. Reason: {1}
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a new user tries to change his SAML password.
Message.name: OAUTH_REQUEST_FAILED

LocalizedMessage.localizedText: Der Zugriff auf den OAuth Provider mit der URL ''{0}'' ist fehlgeschlagen. Ursache: {1}

Message.defaultText: Sending request to OAuth server ''{0}} \nHeader Fields: \n{1}
Message.name: OAUTH_PROVIDER_REQUEST

Message.defaultText: Received response from OAuth server: {0} \nHeader Fields: \n{1}
Message.name: OAUTH_PROVIDER_RESPONSE

Message.defaultText: Body: {0}
Message.name: OAUTH_BODY

Message.defaultText: The provided certificate data is not a valid X.509 certificate.
Message.description: Exceptions with this error code are thrown if a requested db property is not defined.
Message.name: INVALID_PROVIDER_CERTIFICATE

LocalizedMessage.localizedText: Die übergegeben Daten sind kein gültiges X.509 Zertifikat.
